uk.ac.qmul.sbcs.evolution.convergence.util
Class EnsemblCodeGuesser

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.qmul.sbcs.evolution.convergence.util.EnsemblCodeGuesser

public final class EnsemblCodeGuesser
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract class invoked to use the EnsembleCodeGuesser.guess() method functionality to detect Ensembl (ENSG) codes from a filename or string.

Author:
Joe Parker, Kitson Consulting / Queen Mary University of London

Constructor Summary
EnsemblCodeGuesser()
          No-arg constructor, should never be used anyway.
 
Method Summary
static java.lang.String guess(java.io.File input)
           
static java.lang.String guess(java.lang.String input)
          Parses an input string to see if it contains a substring which could be an Ensembl code; here defined as a 15-digit alphanumeric starting 'ENSG...'
Attempts to split the string up into tokens based on '_', '.' or ',' chars and then tests the tokens to see if they match.

equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

Method Detail

guess

public static java.lang.String guess(java.io.File input)

guess

public static java.lang.String guess(java.lang.String input)
Parses an input string to see if it contains a substring which could be an Ensembl code; here defined as a 15-digit alphanumeric starting 'ENSG...'
Attempts to split the string up into tokens based on '_', '.' or ',' chars and then tests the tokens to see if they match.

Parameters:
input - - the input (query) string
Returns:
ensemblCode - the code, if found, or null, if not.
